newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela Congress approves Central Bank debt bill.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela Congress approves Central Bank debt bill.

text.p: Venezuela's Senate Finance Committee approved Wednesday a bill through which the government will pay off $3.7 billion in debts with the Central Bank, legislators said.
It was the final legislative hurdle for the bill which paves the way for the Central Bank to begin issuing treasury bills on behalf of the government to meet service payments on the debt.
Central Bank officials have said the bill is urgently required to relieve the burden of soaking up excess liquidity through large weekly auctions of its own Monetary Stabilization, or TEM, bills.
